name: ableton-mcp
description: Control Ableton Live from Claude — create tracks, write MIDI, mix, launch clips, tweak devices, and more.
long_description:
Full integration with Ableton Live through the Model Context Protocol. Create MIDI and audio tracks, write notes into clips, control mixing (volume, pan, mute, solo, sends), manage scenes, tweak device parameters, control transport and recording, and browse instruments — all from natural language.

Requires Ableton Live running with the AbletonMCP Remote Script installed.
